CustomField.description: CLAIMSV2 -62. If the “Payment Processing Days” is less than or equals to ZERO, set it to 1, else difference between Settlement_Acceptance_Received_Date__c and Status Date : Payment Document Generated
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Difference between Settlement_Acceptance_Received_Date__c and Status Date : Payment Document Generated
CustomField.label: Payment Processing Days
